text: Rozlucheni zhinky povynni ochikuvaty try terminy misyachnykh. Ne dozvoleno yim prykhovuvaty te, shcho Allah stvoryv u lonakh yikhnikh — yakshcho vony viruyutʹ u Allaha ta v Ostanniy Denʹ. Yakshcho zh choloviky yikhni pobazhayutʹ prymyrennya, to protyahom tsʹoho chasu vony mayutʹ pravo povernuty yikh. Vidpovidno do zvychayu zhinky mayutʹ taki prava, yaki rivni yikhnim obovʺyazkam, khocha choloviky u dechomu y vyshchi vid nykh. Allah — Velykyy, Mudryy
